{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino8-uno/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = LinkSprite_pcDuino8_Uno |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = LinkSprite |model = pcDuino |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 8 Uno |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H8; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |gpu1chip1 = PowerVR;SGX544MP1; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Micro SD Card slot |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G16460-HYK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:00:A5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.90-rc1;Allwinner Technology version: 2.1.0; |stockos = Linux;3.4.39;Linaro 14.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, MIPI CSI, Audio out 3.5mm jack, SPI, I2C, GPIO, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP818;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = linaro |defaultpass = linaro |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 4.4
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2015 |estprice = 49 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B016B4EIFQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H8 Octa-core Cortex-A7 *GPU: ''PowerVR'' SGX544MP1 *Memory: 2GB DDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot
==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-sunxi.org/LinkSprite_pcDuino8_Uno ''LinkSprite pcDuino8 Uno'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/09/08/pcduino8-uno-is-an-allwinner-h8-octa-core-development-board-with-arduino-headers/ ''pcDuino8 Uno is an Allwinner H8 Octa-core Development Board with Arduino Headers'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
